strengths: Galvanize mechanic — galvanized units roll one additional die in combat and abilities
Phoenix Standard — after combat, galvanize one participating unit (snowball effect)
Liberate — gain control of planet readied if infantry >= resource value; otherwise place free infantry
Proxima Targeting VI cancels bombardment hits and grants bombardment ability
Helios space dock has production value = 2 + planet resource value
weaknesses: Only 1 commodity — weakest trade economy in the game
Home system is weak (Ordinian 0/0 + Revelation 1/2 space station)
Low complexity but requires understanding galvanize timing
tips: Galvanize snowballs — each combat makes your units stronger for the next
Liberate means taking planets is efficient: either they come readied or you get free infantry
Choose 1 blue or yellow starting tech — adapt to your slice
Proxima Targeting VI is key: cancels enemy bombardment and gives you bombardment
Raise the Standard promissory note lets allies galvanize in combat — sell it
Egeiro mech applies +1 per non-home controlled planet — scales with territory
Infantry-heavy strategy synergizes with Liberate ability

techPaths.note: Choose 1 blue or yellow starting tech; Proxima Targeting VI is the key faction tech
